help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm1: If your computer's MAC address is registered with your ISP for Internet access and you do not wish to re-register the MAC address, then you may assign the currently registered MAC address to the Router.
help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm2: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm5: To have the Router clone the MAC address you specify below, select Enabled.
help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm7: Enter the MAC address registered with your ISP.
help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm9: Click this option to clone the MAC address of the computer you are using.
help_connectivity_macclone.lang_hcm10: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
